revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Already updated by Berkes; pushing through to clear the board
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Update text as per Mihálykó 2015. Revise metadata before finalization.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: remove extra space at beginning of r.4 and dot the nu; use high-punctus in r.6; add dots in r.6; last epsilon in r.6 is eta in the edition; use long-vertical-bar in r.7; add dot in r.7; add dot in r.8; add dot in r.9; add dot in r.10; add dot in r.11; add dot in r.12; add dot in r.13; add dot in r.14; remove hyphen at end of v.2; add dots in v.3; add dots in v.4; add dots in v.5. Review all metadata before finalization.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: remove extra space at beginning of r.4 and dot the nu; use high-punctus in r.6; add dots in r.6; last epsilon in r.6 is eta in the edition; use long-vertical-bar in r.7; add dot in r.7; add dot in r.8; add dot in r.9; add dot in r.10; add dot in r.11; add dot in r.12; add dot in r.13; add dot in r.14; remove hyphen at end of v.2; add dots in v.3; add dots in v.4; add dots in v.5. Review all metadata before finalization.
Submit - I submit to P. Mon. Epiph. 607, proofread print edition

Submit - I entered the text from its reedition, cf. the added introductory matter, I corrected the ed.pr.'s ἐλπίσα|μεν in r. lin6-7 to ἠλπίσαμεν. I was not entirely sure about the use of *slanting-stroke*: please check whether there is a better mark up.

Submit - I entered the text from its reedition, cf. the added introductory matter, I corrected the ed.pr.'s ἐλπίσα|μεν in r. lin6-7 to ἠλπίσαμεν. I was not entirely sure about the use of *slanting-stroke*: please check whether there is a better mark up.
